DOC.detailed_description: The design study standard human repeat insult patch test . To test moisturizer sunscreen SPF 50+ potential induce contact sensitization repetitive application , healthy subject receive 9 application 48 72 hour interval moisturizer upper back . Patches remain skin approximately 48 72 hour . Twelve 24 day previous application , subject patch moisturizer original site alternative site 48 hour .
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 70 year age general good health Can read , understand , sign informed consent History acute chronic disease Diagnosed chronic skin allergy Pregnant lactating
